ISSUE.TITLE: Document using "Encrypt=false" in the connection string on the Orchard Setup Page.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ![image](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/assets/92299130/3b50adb6-c47a-43bb-a93b-b90c39069eb8) There could be some documentation indicating the usage of `Encrypt=false` for local development on the Orchard Core setup page because it is possible that if someone tries to use a SQL db without that as the original documentation suggests they would not be able to connect to the DB. ### Describe the solution you'd like Document `Encrypt=false` in the Hint below the TextField.
